translations: 流浪者；漫游者；迷路的动物

sentences.sentence: This wanderer is no stranger to me!
sentences.translation: 这个流浪者，我并不陌生！

sentences.sentence: A frantic wanderer and witness of Gods law.
sentences.translation: 疯狂的流浪者和神法的见证者。

sentences.sentence: Poe the man, Mr Ackroyd tells us, “has become the image of the poète maudit, the blasted soul, the wanderer.”
sentences.translation: 埃克罗伊德告诉我们，坡这个人“成了被诅咒的诗人、被诅咒的灵魂、流浪者的象征”。
